content: credentials are used: – Hostname: localhost – Port: 8443 – Username: ibmlhadmin – Password: password – Database: tpch – SSL: True – SSLTrustStorePath: /certs/presto-key.jks – SSLTrustStorePassword: watsonx.data Note: The IBM watsonx.data Presto database prioritizes secure communication. To achieve this goal, it relies on a client-side certificate for authentication. This certificate acts as a digital key that verifies your identity when connecting to the database. When using a Jupyter Notebook environment with IBM watsonx.data Presto, the certificate is available within a dedicated notebook that is named Credentials, as shown in Figure 3-2. This notebook contains links for downloading the necessary certificate files. 32 Simplify Your AI Journey: Hybrid, Open Data Lakehouse with IBM watsonx.data 4.
